sentences.english: For a low dribble the ball is dribbled on the side of your body opposite the defensive player.
sentences.chinese: 低運球時，球應處於你身體遠離防守球員的一側。

sentences.english: The basketball player bounced the ball along the ground.
sentences.chinese: 籃球隊員沿場向前運球。

sentences.english: The basic techniques concerned with passing, taking a pass and dribbling are the weakness in the real games.
sentences.chinese: 傳接球和運球基本技術在實戰運用中是薄弱環節。

sentences.english: We are concentrating our efforts on the turn around dribble.
sentences.chinese: 我們集中精力練習策應隊員轉身運球。

sentences.english: He basically was just teasing Livingston with that dribble.
sentences.chinese: 他簡直是用這運球調戲利文斯頓一樣。

sentences.english: Advanced Class emphasizes on teaching skills from dribbling, passing, to position and game strategy.
sentences.chinese: 提高班則注重教授運球和投籃的技術運用。

sentences.english: The players try to advance the ball with their wooden sticks.
sentences.chinese: 運動員用木製曲棍運球。

sentences.english: During full court scrimmages make it a violation when a player dribbles .
sentences.chinese: 打全場練習賽時有人運球就算違例。

sentences.english: Tingshuo enjoys paling hockey and is beginning to stop and dribble the ball with some accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 朔寶喜歡打曲棍球並且嘗試停下和準確運球。

sentences.english: He dribbled it straight across the court.
Teams attempt to advance the ball down the field with their wooden sticks.
sentences.chinese: 比賽中球隊用木製曲棍運球向前。

sentences.english: I dribbled it straightly past him.
My cabin is water-tight as to big splashes, but damp and dribbling.
sentences.chinese: 我的小屋水嚴格，飛濺大，但潮溼和運球。

sentences.english: Thus inspired, Bryant came down, dribbled into traffic … and missed a jumper.
sentences.chinese: 受此影響，布萊恩特上場就運球失誤而且又一次跳投。

sentences.english: If you had unlimited dribbles, I'd say Wade.
sentences.chinese: 如果你對運球沒有限制，我選韋德。

definition: to snatch gold/to take first place in a competition
to spike the ball (volleyball etc)/to smash (tennis etc)
